It find the max and min value in dataframe columns, based on these values it downcast the datatypes of that columns.```pythonfrom downcast import reduceimport pandas as pd# load your dataframedf = pd.read_csv("PATH")# reduce the size of dataframedf = reduce(df) ```## Development setupFor local development setup```shgit clone https://github.com/deepak7376/downcastcd downcastpip install -r requirements.txt```## Release History* 0.0.8 * CHANGE: added downloads stats* 0.0.7 * CHANGE: Readme fixed* 0.0.6 * CHANGE: Tested version* 0.0.5 * CHANGE: work in progress## MetaDeepak Yadav – [@imdeepak_dky](https://twitter.com/imdeepak_dky) – dky.united@gmail.comDistributed under the MIT license.
